item.title: Neural ODE
item.description: Topic: Chen RTQ, Rubanova Y, Bettencourt J, Duvenaud D. Neural Ordinary Differential Equations. arXiv [cs.LG]. 2018. Available: http://arxiv.org/abs/1806.07366 Use the following timezone tool or click on the “Add to Calendar” button on the sidebar. Click here for an interactive widget.
